critique: The initial scores seem reasonable given the document's focus on establishing a memorial and commemorating the Holocaust. However, I will adjust the scores slightly to better reflect the intended emotional impact. I will increase the 'joy' score to acknowledge the positive aspect of remembrance and honoring the victims. I will also slightly increase the 'sadness' score to emphasize the solemnity of the occasion. The other scores remain relatively low as the document primarily aims to establish a process and framework rather than evoke strong emotional reactions.
